descriptions.raw: Radiating heat and boldness, rubies are sought after for their intensity and fiery color. Theyâ€™re seen as emblems of power, courage, and ambition. In regions where Investiture is known to manifest physically, rubies have been rumored to react to extreme emotion.
descriptions.cut: This ruby has been carved to perfection, its fiery depths magnified by each facet. Often worn by those who value ambition, drive, and prestige.
descriptions.sphere: A vibrant ruby sphere, warm-toned and finely polished. This gemstone can contain Stormlight and is favored in fabrials related to heat, fire, and energy.
